Name: Burg Battle
About the game: Burg Battle is a reverse tower defense game. Build custom bases, strategically counter your enemies, and push to destroy their castle. Features Play online with your friends or offline with bots. Two game modes: traditional tug of war and horde. A deep progression system where you can customize for your playstyle. Two unique races to play, each with their own units, abilities, and talent trees.
